definitions.title: vb.
definitions.body: be astounded, dumbfounded (NH id.; so Aram. [[תְּמַהּ]], tmah);—

definitions.title: Qal
definitions.body: Pf. 3 pl. [[תָּמָָהוּ]] Ps 48:6; Impf. 2 ms. [[תִּתְמֶהּ]] Ec 5:7; 3 mpl. [[יִתְמְהוּ]] Job 26:11, etc.; Imv. mpl. [[תְּמָָהוּ]] Is 29:9, Hb Hab 1:5;—be astounded Is 29:9, Hb Hab 1:5 (v. Hithp.), Je 4:9 (‖[[שׁׂמם ]], Niph.), Ps 48:6; + [[מִן]] caus. Job 26:11; + [[על]] rei at which Ex 5:7; look in astonishment at [[אִישׁ אֶל־רֵעֵהוּ]] ´[[ת]]: Ge 43:33 (J), Is 13:8.

definitions.title: Qal
definitions.body: Imv. [[וְהִתַּמְּהוּ]] [[תְּמָהוּ]] Hb Hab 1:5 (v. supr), lit. astonish yourselves, be astounded but We
